title: Brand new furnished two apartments @ Thalawathugoda
details:
Fully furnished brand new two apartments for sale close to Thalawathugoda junction
1. Apartment 01
Spacious sitting and dinning area
Three bed rooms
Two bathrooms
Modern fitted pantry
Servant bathroom
All rooms are A/C
One Parking space
1550 sq.ft
Price : 22.5 Mn (with Furniture) 21.5 Mn (without furniture)

2. Apartment 2
Spacious sitting and dinning area
Two bed rooms
Two bathrooms
Modern fitted pantry
One Parking space
All rooms are A/C
1200 sq.ft
Price : 18.0 Mn (with furniture) 17.0 Mn (without Furniture)

Other common Facilities
Gymnasium, Roof terrace , Common area with Bar
Swimming pool (under construction)
